meta.description: Determine how many hours should be allocated to each component in each workshop to maximize the number of completed products.

sets.name: WORKSHOPS
sets.description: The workshops where components are produced.

sets.name: COMPONENTS
sets.description: The components that make up the product.

params.name: production_capacity
params.description: The total number of production hours available for each workshop.

params.name: productivity
params.description: The productivity in units per hour for each component in each workshop.

vars.name: hours_allocated
vars.description: The number of hours allocated to each component in each workshop.

objective.name: max_completed_products
objective.expr: sum(hours_allocated[w][c] * productivity[w][c] for w in WORKSHOPS for c in COMPONENTS)
objective.description: Maximize the number of completed products.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_A
constraints.description: The total hours allocated in workshop A must not exceed its capacity.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_B
constraints.description: The total hours allocated in workshop B must not exceed its capacity.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_C
constraints.description: The total hours allocated in workshop C must not exceed its capacity.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_D
constraints.description: The total hours allocated in workshop D must not exceed its capacity.
